articles.title: Scott Johnson's killer jailed for 12 years over infamous 1988 murder - ABC News
articles.description: Scott White, the man responsible for the notorious Sydney murder of American mathematician Scott Johnson more than three decades ago, is jailed for 12 years — but a Supreme Court justice stops short of calling the killing a gay-hate crime.
articles.content:
The man responsible for the notorious Sydney murder of Scott Johnson three decades ago has been jailed for 12 years.

articles.title: Get ready for a total lunar eclipse, Chicago - Chicago Tribune
articles.description: The Chicago area and much of North America will experience a total lunar eclipse on May 15, according to the Adler Planetarium.
articles.content: The Chicago area and much of North America will experience a total lunar eclipse on Sunday, May 15, according to the Adler Planetarium. Weather permitting, Chicagoans will be able to see the eclipse … [+1393 chars]
